resources.howToChangePicture: How can I change my profile picture?
resources.avatarDescription:
Profile pictures are managed through the <0>Gravatar</0> internet service.
A Gravatar is a globally recognized avatar, which is linked to your email address.
This service can then be used by other websites to display a profile picture for a given email address.
Please note that our website has no influence on the use of your data by this service.
If you agree, you can create a profile <0>here</0>.

Profilbilder werden durch den Internetdienst <0>Gravatar</0> verwaltet.
Ein Gravatar ist ein global verfügbarer Avatar (Globally Recognized Avatar), welcher mit Ihrer E-Mail-Adresse verknüpft ist.
Dieser Dienst kann dann von anderen Webseiten benutzt werden, um ein Profilbild zu einer E-Mail-Adresse anzuzeigen.
Beachten Sie bitte, dass unsere Website keinen Einfluss auf die Verwendung Ihrer Daten bei diesem Dienst hat.
Wenn Sie damit einverstanden sind, können Sie <0>hier</0> ein Profil erstellen.

resources.name: PDF viewer
resources.caption: Caption
resources.showTextOverlayInfo:
Shows a transparent layer on top of the document enabling users to select text.
Please note that the placement of the overlayed characters will most likely not
be completely in sync with the PDF document due to technical limitations.

resources.name: PDF-Anzeige
resources.caption: Legende
resources.showTextOverlayInfo:
Zeigt eine transparente Schicht über dem Dokument an, die es Benutzern ermöglicht, Text zu selektieren.
Bitte beachten Sie, dass die Zeichenplatzierung im überlagernden Text aus technischen Gründen nicht
vollständig mit der des Dokuments übereinstimmen kann.

resources.registrationVerificationEmail.subject: Welcome to educandu!
resources.registrationVerificationEmail.text:
Welcome!

You have registered with educandu as {username}.
To complete your registration, please confirm your email address through the following link: {verificationLink}
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.
resources.registrationVerificationEmail.html:
Welcome!

You have registered with educandu as {username}.
To complete your registration, please confirm your email address through the following link: confirm registration
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.
resources.passwordResetEmail.subject: Your password for educandu
resources.passwordResetEmail.text:
Hello {username}!

You have requested a password reset on educandu.
To assign a new password, please follow this link: {completionLink}
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.
resources.passwordResetEmail.html:
Hello {username}!

You have requested a password reset on educandu.
To assign a new password, please follow this link: change password.
The link remains valid for {hours, plural, =1 {one hour} other {# hours}}.
resources.roomInvitationEmail.subject: You have been invited to a room
resources.roomInvitationEmail.text:
Hello!

User {ownerName} has invited you to the room {roomName}.
To accept the invitation, please follow this link: {invitationLink}
The link remains valid for {days, plural, =1 {one day} other {# days}}.
resources.roomInvitationEmail.html:
Hello!

User {ownerName} has invited you to the room {roomName}.
To accept the invitation, please follow this link: Join room.
The link remains valid for {days, plural, =1 {one day} other {# days}}.
resources.roomDeletionNotificationEmail.subject: A room you were a member of has been deleted
resources.roomDeletionNotificationEmail.text:
Hello!

User {ownerName} has deleted the room {roomName}.

Hello {username}!

User {ownerName} has ended your membership in room {roomName}.
Your membership invitation to a room has been revoked

User {ownerName} has revoked your membership invitation to room {roomName}.

Sie haben sich als {username} auf educandu registriert.

Der Link bleibt {hours, plural, =1 {eine Stunde} other {# Stunden}} gültig.

Der Link bleibt {hours, plural, =1 {eine Stunde} other {# Stunden}} gültig.
